title: STUNNING VIEWS FROM FURNISHED GRAN PARAISO!!
posting_body: ['Stunning views from the 46th floor at Gran Paraiso tower in Edgewater.', "This spacious fully furnished condo boasts three full bathrooms, private elevator entry, high impact glass doors, 10' ceilings, porcelain flooring and has the larger, 10' deep balcony that forms part of the facade bubble .", 'High-end finishes include ItalKraft cabinetry, Sub-Zero + Wolf appliances, top of the line bathroom fixtures and motorized shades.', "Unmatched amenities include a 100' wide resort style pool, tennis courts, bowling alley, fitness center, spa and movie theater just to name a few!", 'Also enjoy the BeachClub & award winning restaurant at Amara by acclaimed chef Michael Schwartz.', 'Located in Edgewater & close to Midtown, the Design District, downtown Miami and M. Beach', 'all units are one year lease min!', 'credit score close to 700 or higher required, proof of income 2,5 greater than rent price, first month + last month + security deposit to move in!', 'Dilya Taveras', 'Equity Realty', 'TEXT :', 'show contact info']
